sentences: Trøen picked up the saxophone at 16 in 2008, and studied jazz at Voss Jazzskule.
In 2013, she played with her own Elisabeth Lid Trøen Quartet, at Vossajazz, including with pianist Erlend Slettevoll, bassist Steinar Raknes, and drummer Erik Nylander.
At the 2014 Vossajazz she played with Signe Førre Band.
In 2016 Trøen continued the collaboration with Tord Gustavsen.
At the 2018 Vossajazz Trøen appeared with the Bergen Big Band featuring keyboardist and orchestra leader Django Bates.
